RelatedSentence: The man , identified Monday as Lorenzo Baltazar - Trujillo , fell from a steep , rocky area near Grizzly Peak Boulevard , police said .
It 's not known when he fell , but a hiker found Baltazar - Trujillo 's body around 2:20 p.m. Sunday .
We think he was probably trying to climb a rock and slipped , UC Berkeley police Lt. Marc DeCoulode said .

We think he was probably trying to climb a rock and slipped , UC Berkeley police Lt. Marc DeCoulode said .
DeCoulode said Baltazar - Trujillo was not a student at UC Berkeley .

Police said there were no signs of foul play , but the results of toxicology tests to determine whether Baltazar - Trujillo was drinking or had taken drugs wo n't be known for weeks , according to the Alameda County Coroner 's Office .
